content.title: 2.5-inch Intake Vents (10-pack)
content.body:
These intake vents fit on the vertical ribs of your shipping container walls to provide airflow for your AdaptAIR™ roof ventilation. 
We recommend installing at least ten of these 2.5-inch louver vents for each AdaptAIR vent on your container. 
Very simple to install. Use a 2.5-inch carbide-tipped hole saw to drill a hole. Pop in the louver vents and press the tabs on the inside wall to keep it in place.
These vents can be installed a few inches above the floor evenly spaced on the sidewalls.
These vents use a .020-gauge aluminum for our round aluminum louvers, screens and plugs - most manufacturers use a thinner gauge, which leads to a weaker product. This thick, durable material maximizes lifespan and ensures proper ventilation needs.

content.title: AdaptAIR™ (10-PACK) Roof Vent Adapter for Shipping Containers
content.body:
WHOLESALE PRICING WITH THIS 10-PACK OF ADAPTAIR™ VENTS!

This product includes:

Ten (10) AdaptAIR™ vent adapters for 3.5-inch corrugationPLUS ten (10) complete installation kits:
Drill bits
Driver bit
Screws
Abrasive pad

Step-by-step photo instructions


Not included:

WIND TURBINES: We are out of stock until late April 2025. You can Google search "12 in. Lomanco Whirlybird" to find the Lomanco turbine we recommend.
ADHESIVE is not included. Only use a professional grade structural adhesive for metal. We highly recommend Chem Link M1: (Click here to buy Chem Link M1 on Amazon)
------------------------------------------
AdaptAIR™ is an easy-to-install, epoxy-coated steel adapter for adding ventilation to the corrugated roof of your shipping container.
AdaptAIR™ will fit any turbine with a 12-inch collar (Whirlybird turbine, solar powered turbine, or static vent) which can be found online or at your local hardware store.
PRECISE DESIGN • Only product designed for standard 3.5" ribbing on Conex shipping container roof corrugation. Please refer to our measurement chart.
DO-IT-YOURSELF • Includes complete installation kit and instructions for easy installation.
GUARANTEED FIT • No hassle guarantee on fit or quality. Molded with tight tolerances to match your container roof corrugation.
MASSIVE AIRFLOW • Add any full size 12-inch turbine vent, static vent, or solar powered vent. ALL sold separately.
MOLDED STEEL • One piece stamped steel coated in gray epoxy for a lifetime guarantee.
EPOXY COATING • Durable industrial grade coating far exceeds the coating used on shipping containers. Epoxy can be coated with any roof paint or coating.
GUARANTEED FOR THE LIFE OF YOUR CONTAINER

content.title: COMPLETE VENT SYSTEM: AdaptAIR™ Vent + Whirlybird Turbine for Shipping Containers
content.body:
COMPLETE ROOF VENTILATION SYSTEM(Adapter + wind turbine)

This product includes:

One (1) AdaptAIR™ roof vent adapter for 3.5-inch corrugation
One (1) Wind Turbine designed for AdaptAIR™PLUS installation kit:
Drill bits
Driver bit
Screws
Abrasive pad
Step-by-step photo instructions


Not included:

ADHESIVE is not included. Only use a professional grade structural adhesive for metal. We highly recommend Chem Link M1: (Click here to buy Chem Link M1 on Amazon)
------------------------------------------
AdaptAIR™ Vent Adapter
AdaptAIR™ vent adapter is an easy-to-install, epoxy-coated steel adapter for adding ventilation to the corrugated roof of your shipping container.
Container ventilation is critical to reduce high temperatures and avoid condensation known as "container rain," which can cause damage to your stored items.
PRECISE DESIGN • Only product designed for standard 3.5" ribbing on Conex shipping container roof corrugation. Please refer to our measurement chart.
DO-IT-YOURSELF • Includes complete installation kit and instructions for easy installation.
GUARANTEED FIT • No hassle guarantee on fit or quality. Molded with tight tolerances to match your container roof corrugation.
MASSIVE AIRFLOW • Add any full size 12-inch turbine vent, static vent, or solar powered vent. ALL sold separately.
MOLDED STEEL • One piece stamped steel coated in gray epoxy for a lifetime guarantee.
EPOXY COATING • Durable industrial grade coating far exceeds the coating used on shipping containers. Epoxy can be coated with any roof paint or coating.
GUARANTEED FOR THE LIFE OF YOUR CONTAINER
 ------------------------------------------
Wind Turbine for AdaptAIR™
We designed our wind turbine for AdaptAIR™ to be the best performing shipping container ventilator on the market for our AdaptAIR™ ventilation system.
Container Creations designed this custom 12-inch wind-powered turbine vent to be the best performing shipping container ventilator on the market for our AdaptAIR™ product.

24 CURVED BLADES deliver powerful airflow capture while protecting against rain and water entry. **Compare to the industry standard of 21 blades fans.
THICKENED 201 STAINLESS STEEL for the highest-rated durability and resistance to rust and corrosion. You can feel the difference compared to other turbines.**Compare to the industry standard of galvanized steel.
 PRECISION COLLAR designed to fit precisely on the AdaptAIR™ vent adapter with (3) mounting screw holes.
PERMANENTLY LUBRICATED BEARINGS are maintenance-free and designed to enable near fiction-less spin with the lightest of breeze.
SELF-TAPPING MOUNT SCREWS are included to easily affix the turbine to your AdaptAIR™ vent adapter.
WIND SPEED = CUBIC FEET PER MINUTE:3.5 mph = 470 CFM5 mph wind = 1236 CFM7.5 mph breeze = 1471 CFM10 mph = 1650 CFM

content.title: SkyDOME™  Skylight for Shipping Containers
content.body:
SkyDOME™ is an easy-to-install, 12-inch polycarbonate skylight for adding natural light to the corrugated roof of your Conex shipping container.
SkyDOME™ is an innovative daylight-enhancing dome that will light from any angle all year long. Designed to install quickly, you can bring much needed light to the darkest corners of your shipping container. The 4mm thick injection molded dome has a diamond cut surface allow the greatest refraction of light without creating any hot spots.
Each skylight includes an installation kit:

Step-by-step photo instructions
(2) drill bits
(1) driver bit
(30) screws
(30) rubber tips for screw points
Abrasive pad

FOR BEST RESULTS, USE A PROFESSIONAL GRADE STRUCTURAL ADHESIVE.  WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND CHEM LINK M1 (Click here for link to Amazon)
------------------------------------------
PRECISE DESIGN • Only product is designed for standard 3.5" ribbing on Conex shipping container roof corrugation. Please refer to our measurement chart.
DO-IT-YOURSELF • Includes complete installation kit and instructions for easy installation.
BLOCKS UVA & UVB RAYS • Polycarbonate has built in protection against damaging UV rays.
REPLACEABLE DOME & GASKET • If you ever need to replace the dome on your SkyDome™, we offer a replacement kit so you don't need to remove the metal adapter from your container.
MOLDED STEEL • One piece stamped steel coated in gray epoxy for a lifetime guarantee.
EPOXY COATING • Durable industrial grade coating far exceeds the coating used on shipping containers. Epoxy can be coated with any roof paint or coating.
GUARANTEED FOR THE LIFE OF YOUR CONTAINER
